sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_OrganizationInfoID, PreCloseDate, CloseDate FROM Inventory.BIN_PrmStockCloseDay WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND DATEDIFF(D,CloseDate,CONVERT(date,#bussinessDate#)) = 0 GROUP BY BIN_OrganizationInfoID, PreCloseDate, CloseDate
SELECT Count(BIN_PrmStockCloseDayID) FROM Inventory.BIN_PrmStockCloseDay WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND Month(CloseDate) = #month#

SELECT T.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, T.BIN_InventoryInfoID, T.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID, T.BIN_ProductVendorPackageID, T.BIN_StorageLocationInfoID, SUM(ISNULL(T.hQuantity,0)+ISNULL(T.hinQuantity,0)-ISNULL(T.houtQuantity,0)) AS Quantity FROM (SELECT A.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, A.BIN_InventoryInfoID, A.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID, A.BIN_ProductVendorPackageID, A.BIN_StorageLocationInfoID, ISNULL(A.Quantity,0) AS hQuantity, 0 AS hinQuantity, 0 AS houtQuantity FROM Inventory.BIN_PrmStockHistory A WHERE A.CutOfDate = CONVERT(date,#preCloseDate#) AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' UNION ALL SELECT B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, B.BIN_InventoryInfoID, B.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID, B.BIN_ProductVendorPackageID, B.BIN_StorageLocationInfoID, 0 AS hQuantity, ISNULL(B.Quantity,0) AS hinQuantity, 0 AS houtQuantity FROM Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockInOut A JOIN Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockDetail B ON A.BIN_PromotionStockInOutID = B.BIN_PromotionStockInOutID AND B.StockType = '0' AND B.ValidFlag ='1' JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor C JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct D ON C.BIN_PromotionProductID = D.BIN_PromotionProductID AND D.IsStock = '1' ON B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = C.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID WHERE A.StockInOutDate > CONVERT(date,#preCloseDate#) AND A.StockInOutDate <= CONVERT(date,#closeDate#) AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.CloseFlag = '2' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' UNION ALL SELECT B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, B.BIN_InventoryInfoID, B.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID, B.BIN_ProductVendorPackageID, B.BIN_StorageLocationInfoID, 0 AS hQuantity, 0 AS hinQuantity, ISNULL(B.Quantity,0) AS houtQuantity FROM Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockInOut A JOIN Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockDetail B ON A.BIN_PromotionStockInOutID = B.BIN_PromotionStockInOutID AND B.StockType = '1' AND B.ValidFlag ='1' JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor C JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct D ON C.BIN_PromotionProductID = D.BIN_PromotionProductID AND D.IsStock = '1' ON B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID = C.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID WHERE A.StockInOutDate > CONVERT(date,#preCloseDate#) AND A.StockInOutDate <= CONVERT(date,#closeDate#) AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.CloseFlag = '2' AND A.ValidFlag = '1') T GROUP BY T.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID, T.BIN_InventoryInfoID, T.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID, T.BIN_ProductVendorPackageID, T.BIN_StorageLocationInfoID

UPDATE Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockInOut SET CloseFlag = '2',
WHERE StockInOutDate > CONVERT(date,#preCloseDate#) AND StockInOutDate <= CONVERT(date,#closeDate#) AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

UPDATE Inventory.BIN_PromotionStockInOut SET CloseFlag = '1',
WHERE StockInOutDate > CONVERT(date,#preCloseDate#) AND StockInOutDate <= CONVERT(date,#closeDate#) AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND CloseFlag = '2' AND ValidFlag = '1'
